attributes.action: checks on all immigrant's &fingerprints.if found without it,instant deportation
attributes.additional_details: anyone who wasn't born here don't get anything unless they have paid tax and NI. they must be finger printed so the government can keep a check on who is here. and anyone found to not be on the data base should be kept in a holding cell, not released back into society to report back, as they never do, its a waste of police time chasing these down, why do it twice and waste our hard earned money doing it. put a stop to this now.
attributes.background: fingerprint all immigrants, do background checks on them, if they have a record don't let them in. anyone found in the uk without having this done, send them to a holding cell and instantly deport them. stop letting them go to report back at a later time, they don't come back.
